A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Long time fan here. It was a decent movie but left thinking this was all a dream and Rey is going to wake up in episode 9 and start all over. The Mary Poppins Leia out in space was odd. It also felt like they slapped Abrams in the face a few times by taking his movie and making it for not. In the end it was a different take on a story. I liked it but didn't love it.
